originalText.text: Dr Ng is very knowledgeable and open to answering my questions. She takes the time to conduct thorough exams, and gives me a proper nudge in o follow up on getting medical tests done. Her offices are well done and comfortable.

text.text: Dr Ng is very knowledgeable and open to answering my questions. She takes the time to conduct thorough exams, and gives me a proper nudge in o follow up on getting medical tests done. Her offices are well done and comfortable.

originalText.text: Dr. Ng is a  wonderful physician, highly skilled, professional, providing outstanding patient centered care. She asks excellent questions and is never in a rush to finish an exam. I highly recommend her.

text.text: Dr. Ng is a  wonderful physician, highly skilled, professional, providing outstanding patient centered care. She asks excellent questions and is never in a rush to finish an exam. I highly recommend her.

originalText.text: Super clean, organized office. Hard to believe I’m saying this, but they’re a pleasure to deal with. Dr. Ng is punctual, personable and thorough. Fortunately, I haven’t had to deal with any crisis since she’s been my doctor, but I feel confident with her at that center of my care.

text.text: Super clean, organized office. Hard to believe I’m saying this, but they’re a pleasure to deal with. Dr. Ng is punctual, personable and thorough. Fortunately, I haven’t had to deal with any crisis since she’s been my doctor, but I feel confident with her at that center of my care.

originalText.text: I appreciate that Dr. Ng takes time to address issues and demonstrates genuine care and interest. She follows up as discussed.

text.text: I appreciate that Dr. Ng takes time to address issues and demonstrates genuine care and interest. She follows up as discussed.

originalText.text: I recently had a bit of a wait for Dr. Ng, around 40 minutes, in a rather cool room while wearing a lightweight medical robe. When she arrived, Dr. Ng didn’t apologize, instead mentioning another patient as the reason for her delay. The lab results and her follow-ups on the results seem to take their time. This has been a common theme during my visits over the last year. Interestingly, Weill Cornell often reminds me about being on time. It’s a bit ironic, don’t you think? Lol!!
